definition: texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Such Biblical references are a valuable working-tool in catechesis.
sentences.chinese: 聖經的引述是教理講授的工具之一。

sentences.english: And so these teachings of Jesus continue to live on.
sentences.chinese: 因此，耶穌的這些教理還在繼續流傳。

sentences.english: Sant Mat is the term for the teachings taught by the Science of Spirituality organization.
sentences.chinese: “明師之路”是靈脩科學組織所教授的教理的總稱。

sentences.english: What are the basic teachings of Science of Spirituality?
sentences.chinese: 靈脩科學協會的基本教理是什麼？

sentences.english: How is God viewed in the teachings of Sant Mat?
sentences.chinese: 明師之路的教理中是如何看待上帝的？

sentences.english: The Catechism was longer, to be used as a teaching aid.
sentences.chinese: 《教理問答》更長一些，用於教學輔助。

sentences.english: Warm, vital piety is one of the distinguishing marks of the catechism.
sentences.chinese: 熱情而有活力的敬虔是這個教理問答獨特的標記之一。
